message.body: I've gotta go to lush sometime this week to pick up a massage bar for Valentine's Day!! How was your Nate visit? Or is he still here?
He is still here. He got in sat night. It's lovely having him. I love all this snow 2!!! But that's only bc I don't have acar. Is Jeff stuck in Florida?
I need to go to lush
I have 5 containers
But I am away for the next three weekends
Idk he and I have barely talked. I think he's back though
I only get one text message a day if that and it's like this:
Whoops sent in wrong order
I have about 15 containers for you at dmitrijs place
Unless he threw them away
Where will you be these coming weekends?
Ny, dc, ny, philly
Nice! Sounds like so much fun!!
So I'm thinking about trying to call Jeff tonight. I feel like things are getting even worse. Do you think I should ask if I can call, or just call later in the night?

I always recommend being upfront. Don't be embarrassed. I think it's obvious you really care about him and just want the best. Let me know how it goes. I'm out to dinner with Nate. It's so lovely having him here for the storm.
I just asked to meet up Wednesday night. I just want to get a feel for things. Dinner at home? So romantic ♥️♥️❤️♥️❤️♥️❤️
Oh no. We are at Barcelona in Washington square. Amazing.
It's so good.
I'll talk to him and set up a date for Valentine's Day. I think classes are cancelled tomorrow too
I think it will go really well with Jeff and he'll appreciate your courage
Yeah they are (Emmanuel & smfa are)
Got some whiskey courage. Drinking at my place with the photo boys
￼Rob in his flannel
